author: barnabasbusa
content: Hey everyone, now that we have alpha 4 released (as of friday last week), I'm curious whether client teams would have a new peerdas ready branch that I can begin testing with?

author: nishant0
content: our current peerDAS branch should be compatible

author: g11tech
content: can you share the spec?

author: barnabasbusa
content: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/releases/tag/v1.5.0-alpha.4

author: barnabasbusa
content: https://notes.ethereum.org/@ethpandaops/peerdas-devnet-2

author: g11tech
content: i pushed metadata changes, but haven't tested them yet but could work outright

author: g11tech
content: are we not including decoupling column groups from subnets ?

author: jimmygchen
content: We haven't got metadata v3 implemented yet (WIP) and still haven't made much progress on sync. Hopefully we can be ready in the next few days

author: jimmygchen
content:
So this issue would be devnet-3 target instead?
https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/issues/3876

author: barnabasbusa
content: Based on the last call I thought we agreed that the peer sampling topic would be moved to another devnet not devnet 2

author: barnabasbusa
content: let me see it in the notes, maybe I misremember

author: barnabasbusa
content: Most likely I made a mistake with that

author: barnabasbusa
content: Lets aim at no sampling then for devnet 2, as probably most clients can have that ready to go a lot quicker

author: agnxsh
content: <@412614104222531604> for Nimbus `peerdas-p2p` is the devnet branch, currently WIP on metadata v3 as well, need some more fixing on sync too, should be ready by Thursday or so, however not sure if we are going with this. If that is the case then it should take me more time.

author: agnxsh
content: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3870 this is what we should follow?

author: barnabasbusa
content: yeah lets aim for it

author: sibkatya
content: <@876848471129333820> I am catching column processing failures. Is it critical? Should I wait for the upcoming PeerDAS updates?

author: jimmygchen
content: in the last breakout, i think we agreed to leave it as it is (clients can still perform sampling but sampling has no impact on fork choice). The PR was created last week. I think that issue should be devnet-3 targets, as we're nowhere near completing the other PR (decouple network subnets)

author: jimmygchen
content: are you on the latest `das` branch? i'm having a bit of issue with it as well, will look into it tomorrow

author: barnabasbusa
content: but that would force every client to still have a working sampling setup for devnet 2 ?

author: jimmygchen
content:
you mean responding to sampling requests?
All clients should support `DataColumnsByRoot` rpc as it's used for sync as well

author: jimmygchen
content: so there should be no impact whether clients perform peer sampling or not, as long as we don't use it for fork choice (i *think* no clients currently have this implemented)

author: barnabasbusa
content: ok, so the no sampling  (3870)can be included already in the next devnet without any issue, but the 3832 - decoupling network subnets from das core should be in devnet 3?

author: jimmygchen
content:
I *think* so, I haven't actually got a chance to read the 3870 spec PR yet, will do that tomorrow as it's EOD for me, maybe others can confirm üôè 
but yeah, i think 3832 would be next devnet

author: barnabasbusa
content: Could you comment to this issue then please, so everyone would be on the same page

author: jimmygchen
content: added a comment

author: g11tech
content: lets just do devnet 3, no sampling else whats the point of removing sampling

author: g11tech
content: and also include this: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3832

author: g11tech
content: so entire issue: 3876

author: g11tech
content: i am starting work on the decoupling this, so may be we target friday for devnet-3?

author: agnxsh
content: i go with this as well

author: dmitriishmatko
content:
I'm confused on the names devnet-1/devnet-2
is this spec actual for what we are going to launch this week? https://notes.ethereum.org/@ethpandaops/peerdas-devnet-2

author: barnabasbusa
content: we already had devnet 1

author: barnabasbusa
content: so the next in line is devnet 2

author: barnabasbusa
content: what exactly will be included is under discussion right now

author: dmitriishmatko
content: we don't have Metadata V3 yet, but I'm happy to include it, already working on it

author: g11tech
content: also can we remove csc from "enr" ? i don't see the use of it with metadata v3

author: dmitriishmatko
content: I think the idea was to help find peers with certain columns. When peer has 1/32 of columns and you have like 70 peers connected as standard with no supernodes it could be difficult to find certain columns and you may need to search for new peer connections
